name: Earth Defense (itch) (SuperGobo)
description:
I worked on this game on and off for about 6 months using a variety of free software. All content is original, including concept, graphics, SFX, music, and coding. Thoughts and comments are welcome.

Note: a keyboard is required to input high scores, but you can play the game with a controller. Control stick moves the ship, the four buttons on the right shoot bullets in respective directions.
